channel.title: Update Question
channel.description:
How can i do that update thing??
So evry player in the server can see:
Server update 0:30 ,, 0:29 ,, etc ..
How do i do that?

item.title: Update Question
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

::update 30.

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
